abstract: Anthony Gildas Kofi Annan (born 21 July 1986 in Accra) is a Ghanaian international footballer, who currently plays as a central midfielder for Schalke 04 of the Bundesliga.
comment: Anthony Gildas Kofi Annan (born 21 July 1986 in Accra) is a Ghanaian international footballer, who currently plays as a central midfielder for Schalke 04 of the Bundesliga.
